abstract: After several painful days of declines, stock markets moved into positive territory Tuesday as the Dow Jones industrials surged nearly 320 points on sunnier forecasts from Wal-Mart, as well as JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs. But many analysts doubted the high spirits would last.
lead_paragraph: After several painful days of declines, stock markets moved into positive territory Tuesday as the Dow Jones industrials surged nearly 320 points on sunnier forecasts from Wal-Mart, as well as JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs. But many analysts doubted the high spirits would last.

headline.main: Banks’ Good News Helps Spark Market Rally, for Now

abstract: Amaranth Advisors, the hedge fund that failed last year after losing $6.5 billion, sued JPMorgan Chase, accusing the bank of sabotaging its efforts to stave off collapse.
lead_paragraph: Amaranth Advisors, the hedge fund that failed last year after losing $6.5 billion, sued JPMorgan Chase, accusing the bank of sabotaging its efforts to stave off collapse.

headline.main: Amaranth Sues JPMorgan Over Fund’s Collapse
